question: Which country test-fired a nuclear-capable surface-to-surface ballistic missile named ‘Shaheen-III’?
explanation:
Pakistan has recently successfully test-fired a nuclear-capable surface-to-surface ballistic missile named ‘Shaheen-III’.
The missile is capable of carrying nuclear and conventional warheads to a range of 2,750 kms. Pakistan is one of the eight countries worldwide with the stated nuclear weapons capability.
